built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Semantic search that finds code by meaning, not exact text. Best for exploring unfamiliar codebases and understanding behavior patterns.

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read file contents with line number ranges. Can read entire files or specific sections with context summary.

built_in_tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
built_in_tools.description: Execute terminal commands on the user's system. Supports background execution and non-interactive flags.

built_in_tools.name: list_dir
built_in_tools.description: List directory contents to understand file structure and organization.

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.description: Fast exact text/regex searches using ripgrep. Best for finding specific symbols, functions, or patterns.

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Create new files or edit existing files with precise line-by-line changes and context preservation.

built_in_tools.name: search_replace
built_in_tools.description: Replace specific text instances in files with unique context identification for precise changes.

built_in_tools.name: file_search
built_in_tools.description: Fuzzy search for files by partial path or filename when exact location is unknown.

built_in_tools.name: delete_file
built_in_tools.description: Delete files safely with graceful error handling for non-existent files.

built_in_tools.name: web_search
built_in_tools.description: Search the web for real-time information, current events, and up-to-date technical documentation.

built_in_tools.name: fetch_pull_request
built_in_tools.description: Fetch pull requests, issues, commits, or git refs with full diff and metadata for understanding code changes.

built_in_tools.name: create_diagram
built_in_tools.description: Create Mermaid diagrams for visualizing architecture, workflows, and system relationships.

built_in_tools.name: edit_notebook
built_in_tools.description: Edit Jupyter notebook cells with support for creating new cells and modifying existing ones.

mcp_tools.name: mcp_server-sequential-thinking_sequentialthinking
mcp_tools.description: Advanced sequential thinking tool for complex problem-solving through structured thought processes. Supports revision, branching, and iterative refinement of solutions.

mcp_tools.name: mcp_context7-mcp_resolve-library-id
mcp_tools.description: Resolves package/product names to Context7-compatible library IDs for accessing up-to-date documentation.

mcp_tools.name: mcp_context7-mcp_get-library-docs
mcp_tools.description: Fetches comprehensive, up-to-date documentation for libraries using Context7-compatible IDs with topic focusing and token limits.
